doc.field: Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
Series XXIII: Pride and Progress / The Right Stuff
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 15 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 4/7/1987]
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 15 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 4/7/1987]

Pride and ProgressNews-highlights:1. Gay Week in Review, with Andy Humm, Darrell Yates Rist, Kitty Cotter, and Jim Levin, sponsored by the Human Rights Campaign Fund2. Discussion of the 1987 National Lesbian and Gay Health Conference, and AIDS in politics overtaking gay rights issuesCOMMERCIAL: Human Rights Campaign Fund3. Discussion of the AIDS and HIV tests, and personal issues surrounding testing4. Andy Humm on "straightening up" a home to hide a homosexual lifestyle5. News Watch, Georgia State Representative shelves legislation to criminalize homosexual sodomy due to controversy created6. "Names Project," a quilt of the names of those killed by AIDS to be displayed on Washington Mall during the March on Washington7. Philadelphia school-board condemns harassment of students based on sexual orientation, provides "sensitivity training" for teachers and administrators8. Independent Catholic newspaper estimates that 50% of Catholic priests in the US are homosexual9. Sports ReportCOMMERCIAL: "First Hand" gay magazine10. Lavender Health, interview with Mary Anne Chaisson, member of the Department of Health's AIDS research unit, which collects data and tracks the epidemic in NYC11. Closing credits
The Right Stuff:1. Naming Names, Lifestyles and Trojan Condoms criticized for calling AIDS "a condom-makers dream" and refusing to advertise in gay publicationsCOMMERCIAL: 10th Annual Awards Evening for the Fund for Human Dignity2. Media Watch, with Brandon Judell, interview with John Dietrich of the Islanders Club, an adventure-oriented clubCOMMERCIAL: GCN Fundraiser3. Episode of GCN's soap opera, "Suds": "See Spot Run"4. Closing credits5. COMMERCIAL: GCN Fundraiser
[1]--Pride and Progress, Episode No. 15 [2]--The Right Stuff[Air Date: 4/7/1987]: April 1987
